G

gainOrLoss(int, int, int, String) - Static method in class com.aldrich.MainGame
This method either adds or subtracts money from the player and dealer and returns an array of the player's and dealer's money.
getBet(int, int) - Static method in class com.aldrich.MainGame
This method gets int bet from the player.
getInitialCards(String[]) - Method in class com.aldrich.PlayerHand
This method gives the player and dealer the two initial cards.
getLargestBet(int, int) - Method in class com.aldrich.Statistics
This method gets and returns the largest bet.
getRank() - Method in class com.aldrich.Card
This method gets a random card rank from the arraylist of card ranks.
getSuit() - Method in class com.aldrich.Card
This method gets a random card suit from the arraylist of card suits.
getThirdCard(String[], char) - Method in class com.aldrich.PlayerHand
This method gives the player a third card if the player chose to hit.
